summary: 1973 Sydney: An Australian gangster sees booming business, due to U.S. soldiers being in town for relaxing between their tours to the Vietnam war, attracts the attention of first the Chicago mafia, and then their East Coast competitors.
cast: Bryan Brown|Toni Collette|John Goodman|Sam Neill|Sam Worthington|Kestie Morassi|William McInnes|Andrew S. Gilbert|Gary Waddell|Felix Williamson|Derek Amer|Laeni Baille|Rudi Baker|Bille Brown|Michael Brownjohn|Joanne Cahill|Paul Chubb|Ray Devitt|Tim Draxl|Gabriel Egan|Nathan Grunert|Alan Hennessy|Brett Archer|Dan Holliday|Sam Jacobson|Toni Jaye|Anthony Jensen|Anthony Johnsen|Holly Jones|Dene Kermond|Brian McDermott|Shane McNamara|John McNeill|Chris Moody|David Morris|Angelo Parisi|Alan Popely|Greg Poppleton|Terry Serio|Andrew Sommerich|Andrew Wholley|Tim Rogers|Andy Kent|Russell Hopkinson|Davey Lane|Dave Scotland|Neil Pepper|Keith Longman|Tony Hicks|Shawn Rader|Justine Scali|Judd Wild
title: Juego sucio
